title: Cards and Casino Voice Announcer
description: 520 high-quality male voice words and phrases for casino, card games, board games, sports etc.
longDescription:
Cafofo's Cards and Casino Voice Announcer comes with 520 high-quality male voice words and phrases for casino, card games, board games, sports etc. 

Each word/phrase come with at least three variations for better usage. 


Includes: 

→ All the cards suits, numbers and ranks.

→ Generic expressions, events, and call to actions, such as: Press a bet; Push; Shuffle; Show cards; Chose your bet 

→ Expressions of classic games like Poker, Baccarat, Roulette, and Blackjack, such as: Royal Flush; Full House; Straight Up; Chip Change; Card Counting; Hole Card 

...and much, much more! 


♫ Listen to the preview 

Check the file list 


Consider our "Casual Game Voice Announcer" for additional content. 


Price may also increase in further updates.


Looking for sounds effects? Consider our Interface and Item Sounds Pack with coins, menu and game sounds for your projects. 


All files are 44.1 KHz, 16 Bit.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Expressions of classic games like Poker, Baccarat, Roulette, and Blackjack, such as: Royal Flush; Full House; Straight Up; Chip Change; Card Counting; Hole Card 
  •  All the cards suits, numbers and ranks.
  •  Generic expressions, events, and call to actions, such as: Press a bet; Push; Shuffle; Show cards; Chose your bet 

Number of Audio Waves: 520

Number of Audio Cues: 520

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 11:16

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android, iOS, Oculus, Other

Important/Additional Notes: All files are stereo ".wav" , 44.1 KHZ 16 bit.

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ltH1JdUWhrEheJ-aayhskIw3RBwMwMBw
